title: Invite Friends & Traders and Earn!
description: Get a percentage of the trading and success fees paid by your friends or from all the investors of the trader's service when you invite a trader to Zignaly

step-1.title: Invite friends & Traders
step-1.description: Share your referral link above for friends to sign up to Zignaly with

step-2.title: They Deposit $100
step-2.description: Get your friends and traders to make a deposit of at least ${{minDeposit}}

step-3.title: You Both Earn
step-3.description: You both get ${{reward}} plus you'll earn commissions from traders

invite-traders-for-percent: <0>Invite traders</0><1>{{value}}%</1><2> of all their investors' success fees</2>
invite-traders-for-percent-modal: Invite traders to get <0>{{value}}%</0> of all their investors' success fees
invite-friends-for-percent-modal: Invite friends to get <0>{{value}}%</0> of their success fees
invite-traders-for-percent-rebate: <0>Invite traders</0><1>{{value}}%</1><2> of all their investors' trading fees</2>
invite-traders-for-percent-rebate-modal: Invite traders to get <0>{{value}}%</0> of all their investors' trading fees
invite-friends-for-percent-rebate-modal: Invite friends<0>{{value}}%</0> of their trading fees
invite-for-deposit: <0>Invite friends</0><1>{{value}} {{symbol}}</1><2> when they make a single deposit of ${{threshold}}+</2>
invite-for-deposit-modal: Invite friends to get <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they make a single deposit of ${{threshold}}+
invite-for-investment: <0>Invite friends</0><1>{{value}} {{symbol}}</1><2> when they make a single investment of ${{threshold}}+</2>
invite-for-investment-modal: Invite friends to get <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they make a single investment of ${{threshold}}+
invite-for-total-investment: <0>Invite friends</0><1>{{value}} {{symbol}}</1><2> when they make investments totalling ${{threshold}}+</2>
invite-for-total-investment-modal: Invite friends to get <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they make investments totalling ${{threshold}}+
invite-for-balance-modal: Invite friends to get <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when their balance reaches ${{threshold}}+
invite-for-signup: <0>Invite friends</0><1>{{value}} {{symbol}}</1><2> when they create and verify an account</2>
invite-for-signup-modal: Invite friends to get <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they create and verify an account
